headline: 3 Reasons UAL is Risky and 1 Stock to Buy Instead
summary: Over the past six months, United Airlines’s shares (currently trading at $83.60) have posted a disappointing 13.4% loss while the S&P 500 was flat. This may have investors wondering how to approach the situation.
